definitions.definition: Any political movement founded on the autonomy and personal freedom of the individual , progress and reform , and government by law with the consent of the governed.
An economic ideology in favour of laissez faire and the free market (related to economic liberalism ).

secondary_definitions: ( politics ) Any political movement founded on the autonomy and personal freedom of the individual , progress and reform , and government by law with the consent of the governed.
( economics ) An economic ideology in favour of laissez faire and the free market (related to economic liberalism ).
